in-uk.required: Select if you are currently in the UK

booked-travel.required: Select if you have booked your travel to the UK

booked-travel-date-to-uk.required: Enter the correct date your travel was booked
booked-travel-date-to-uk.date: Enter the correct travel booked date

travel-doc-number.alphanum: Document number must only include numbers and letters
travel-doc-number.minlength: Document number must be between 9 and 13 characters
travel-doc-number.maxlength: Document number must be between 9 and 13 characters

travel-doc-nationality.invalidOption: You must choose an option from the provided list

travel-doc-dob.date: The date must only contain numbers. For example, 31 3 1980
travel-doc-dob.before: Date of birth must be in the past
travel-doc-dob.after: Enter a real date of birth

premium.required: Select if you have paid for a priority or super priority service

accessing-evisa.required: Select if you are having problems accessing your eVisa

detail-dob.required: Enter your correct date of birth
detail-dob.date: The date must only contain numbers. For example, 31 3 1980
detail-dob.before: Date of birth must be in the past

detail-photo.required: Enter what is wrong with your photo
detail-photo.maxlength: You have exceeded the 500 character limit

detail-nin.required: Enter your correct National Insurance number

detail-restrictions.required: Enter what is wrong with the details of what you can and cannot do in the UK
detail-restrictions.maxlength: You have exceeded the 500 character limit

detail-share-code.required: Enter which share code you are unable to create

detail-status.required: Enter what is wrong with your status

detail-valid-from.required: Enter the correct valid from date

detail-valid-until.required: Enter the correct valid to date

detail-signin-email.required: Enter the correct email address where you can receive security codes
detail-signin-email.email: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
detail-signin-email.maxlength: Email address must be less than 254 characters

detail-signin-phone.required: Enter the correct phone number where you can receive security codes

detail-other.required: Enter the problem that isn't listed
detail-other.maxlength: You have exceeded the 500 character limit

is-refugee.required: Select if you have permission to stay in the UK as a refugee

asylum-support.required: Select if you are receiving asylum support

requestor-full-name.validateText: Full name must only include letters a to z, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

requestor-dob.date: The date must only contain numbers. For example, 31 3 1980
requestor-dob.before: Date of birth must be in the past

requestor-nationality.invalidOption: You must choose an option from the provided list

requestor-brp.regex: Enter your BRP number in the correct format; for example RZX123456 or RZ1234567

requestor-gwf.regex: Enter your GWF number in the correct format; for example, GWF012345678

requestor-uan.regex: Enter your UAN in the correct format; for example, 1234-1234-1234-1234

requestor-ukvi.required: What is your UKVI customer number?
requestor-ukvi.regex: UKVI customer number must start with KX
requestor-ukvi.exactlength: UKVI customer number must be 10 characters long

requestor-contact-method.required: Select how you want to be contacted

requestor-email.email: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
requestor-email.maxlength: Email address must be less than 254 characters

requestor-address-line-1.required: Enter address line 1, typically your building and street

completing-for-someone-else.required: Select if you are completing this form on behalf of someone else

representative-name.validateText: Full name must only include letters a to z, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

representative-email.email: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
representative-email.maxlength: Email address must be less than 254 characters

representative-type.required: Select which type of support you are to the requestor

describe-evisa-error.required: Enter the error with your eVisa
describe-evisa-error.maxlength: You have exceeded the 2000 character limit
